snippet.textDisplay: To be fair the corona converter is just useless. Its easier to redo the material. I think its better if you remove it completely. 9 materials from 10 has metallic workflow, lol? I understand that its not accurate, but when you have a wood with an ior of 2.2 it doesn’t mean its metal…so yea corona 6 converter was a huge time saver, this is useless.
snippet.textOriginal: To be fair the corona converter is just useless. Its easier to redo the material. I think its better if you remove it completely. 9 materials from 10 has metallic workflow, lol? I understand that its not accurate, but when you have a wood with an ior of 2.2 it doesn’t mean its metal…so yea corona 6 converter was a huge time saver, this is useless.

snippet.textDisplay: Sorry to hear you don't find it helpful :( For us to improve it, we'd need to see examples of the materials that don't convert well (bear in mind that some materials CAN'T convert well, if they broke physical laws in how they were set up, which was possible in the Legacy material) - to share examples, head on over to the forums where images, scenes, etc. can be shared and support and developers can see it. https://forum.corona-renderer.com/index.php?topic=33253.0 - thanks! Tom
